sentences.sContent: The first letter she wrote me was less than a page long, and her second letter was similarly brief.
sentences.sCn: 她写给我的第一封信不到一页，第二封信也一样简短。

sentences.sContent: The cost of food and clothing has come down in recent years. Similarly, fuel prices have fallen quite considerably.
sentences.sCn: 吃穿的费用近年来下降了。 同样地，燃料价格也有大幅 回落。
